This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: bright yellow orange sphere about the size of a full moon.
divs: Sighting DetailsAugust 7 2008. I was traveling on interstate 81 through virgina. It was about 4:30 am. I noticed a bright yellow sphere with orange. It looked like a full moon. It was to the left of the highway in an open field. I told my sister in law to look. She just caught a little of it. Then we lost sight of it because of the trees. The moon was cresent that night. And if it was the sun, where was the horizon?
